mainText:
I fell in love with my first MAC in 1987, and have been in love with  
Apple ever since.  Steve, your vision of what these products could do  
enabled me and millions of others to express our creativity in ways we  
once thought unimaginable.  I can think of no greater gift to humanity  
than helping us all tap into our limitless potential to make art.   
Thank you from the bottom of my heart.
author: Sandy
